title: Units
content:
## Absolute Units
- Pixels (px)
- pt, cm, mm, in.

## Relative Units

- Relative to font size (em) and (rem)
- Relative to viewport (vw), (vh), (vmin), (vmax)


## Percentage

- Percentage relative to the parent element
- Mainly used to control width on containers and images



## Sizing

- Max Width and Min Width
- Max Width allows squeezing and prevents expanding
- Max Width will never grow larger than the predefined size




## EM
* Default to 16px
* Size is compounding
* Relative to Same element Font Size when used in Padding or Margin.
* Relative to Parent Element font size When used in font size.
